Docs.summary: Defines the base class and a set of types that derive from it and that correspond to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] controls. Each exposes the corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_avalonwinfx](~/includes/tlasharptla-avalonwinfx-md.md)] control to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
